mapper.insert: INSERT INTO our_news (userNumber, title, content, img_path, createdDate, watched) VALUES (#{userNumber}, #{title}, #{content}, #{img_path}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT ournews.title, m.nickname, ournews.createdDate FROM our_news ournews JOIN member m ON ournews.userNumber = m.userNumber

SELECT ournews.title, m.nickname, m.profile_image_path, ournews.createdDate, ournews.img_path, ournews.content FROM our_news ournews JOIN member m ON ournews.userNumber = m.userNumber WHERE ournews.ourNewsNumber =#{ourNewsNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO our_news_comment (ourNewsNumber, userNumber, content, createdDate) VALUES (#{ourNewsNumber}, #{userNumber}, #{content}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT onc.commentId, m.profile_image_path, m.nickname, onc.content, onc.createdDate FROM our_news_comment onc JOIN member m ON onc.userNumber =m.userNumber WHERE onc.ourNewsNumber=#{ourNewsNumber}
